title: Diamond Mid LF OPEN Team
body:
Mid laner looking for open team. Was previously D4 98LP, loss streak OP. Have a smurf account at Plat 2, a wide range of champions.

Currently ranked 6th Anivia on OCE on http://www.lolskill.net/. Was in the top 3 before this loss streak :/
Also in the top 30 on a few other champions.

Available alot over the next few weeks.

replies.body: bump. still looking for team, started playing league again
